net.jhoogland.jautomata.operations

Class Push<L,K>

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.jhoogland.jautomata.AbstractAutomaton<L2,K2>
      • net.jhoogland.jautomata.operations.UnaryOperation<L,L,K,K>
        • net.jhoogland.jautomata.operations.Reweight<L,K>
          • net.jhoogland.jautomata.operations.Push<L,K>
  • Type Parameters:
    L - label type
    K - weight type (Boolean for regular automata and Double for weighted automata)
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Automaton<L,K>

    public class Push<L,K>
extends Reweight<L,K>

    Reweights the specified automaton using the the generic shortest distance to the final states as potential function. This class is an implementation of the weight pushing algorithm described in [1].

    [1] M. Mohri, M. Riley. A Weight Pushing Algorithm for Large Vocabulary Speech Recognition

    Author:
    Jasper Hoogland
